data.text:
Excellent service with the bar attendents and waiters in Rocky Bar near the pool, especially very kind and always with smailE HANY, EIF, BESHOY and SOLIMAN.
Also very good choice of drinks,  coffee,ice cream, Juice, beer.
Nice food like carbonara, pizza, fish and chips, sandwich and many others.
Thank you
data.title: Excellent ROCKY BAR

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear our valuable Guest,
Thank you for your wonderful feedback! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed excellent service at the Rocky Bar, with our attentive and friendly bar attendants and waiters, especially Hany, Eid, Beshoy, and Soliman. 
We're delighted that you appreciated our wide selection of drinks, coffee, ice cream, juice, and beer, as well as our delicious food options including carbonara, pizza, fish and chips, sandwiches, and more. 
Thank you for choosing our hotel, and we hope to welcome you back soon!
Best Regards
Savoy Guest Service support
owner_response.author: Guest service  support

data.text:
Excellent standard of cleanliness with nice little touches like the towel teddy bear and friendly housekeeper !

Facilities refreshed daily and more available when needed  

Room was cleaned daily and left tidy for us. Leaving us relaxed after a busy day we  we returned
data.title: Housekeeping at the Savoy, Sharm El Sheikh

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear our valuable Guest,
Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the excellent standard of cleanliness and appreciated the thoughtful touches like the towel teddy bear provided by our friendly housekeeping team at the Savoy, Sharm El Sheikh.
We're delighted that your room was cleaned daily and left tidy, allowing you to relax after a busy day. We look forward to welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay!
Best Regards
Savoy Guest Service support
owner_response.author: Guest service  support

data.text: Another fabulous holiday at the Savoy Hotel, Soho Square. The whole experience is truly amazing from the moment you step into the beautiful reception area.  All the staff are professional, hard working and friendly and always go the extra mile to ensure you have an amazing stay.  A shout out to our housekeeper Hussein who kept our room lovely and clean.  Henry, Michael and Ahmed from the pool bar, keeping our Prosecco topped up and always with a cheery welcome and Christina who started our day with her warm greeting in the Tirana Restaurant at breakfast.  There are a great variety of bars and restaurants within the Savoy, where the food is first class and never disappoints.  With Soho Square on your doorstep it's another fabulous area to enjoy eating, drinking, shopping and entertainment. Looking forward to seeing you all again soon.
data.title: Another Amazing Holiday.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear our valuable Guest,
Thank you so much for your kind words! We're thrilled to hear that you had another amazing holiday at the Savoy Hotel, Soho Square. It's wonderful to know that you appreciated our beautiful reception area and that our members provided professional, friendly service throughout your stay.
 We're glad you enjoyed the variety of bars and restaurants within the hotel, as well as the vibrant atmosphere of Soho Square. 
We can't wait to welcome you back soon for another fantastic stay!
warm regards
Savoy Guest Service support
owner_response.author: Guest service  support

data.text:
For anyone who has never been I would rate it very good however, for those of us who went numerous times before COVID standards have slipped. Shame we used to love it but doubt we will go back. 
Management on a day to day basis were good made things up to us. Can’t understand why refurbishment was being done on what I guess is the second most busy season. At least that’s what the prices reflected (Christmas) spa was a massive let down. Much better before
data.title: Disappointed

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Rodman
Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We regret to hear about your disappointment with your recent stay.
We understand your concerns about the changes since your previous visits and regret that we were unable to meet your expectations this time. 
Your comments regarding the spa and refurbishment timing have been duly noted, and we'll strive to address these issues to ensure a better experience for our guests in the future. 
We appreciate your loyalty and hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back and regain your trust in our service.
Savoy Guest Service support
owner_response.author: Guest service  support

data.text: Decent family hotel. Very camphorous stay and relaxation. All the little things are provided both in the rooms and in the recreation areas. attentive staff. the cuisine is top class. Clean beach and sea. Сlean swimming pools too. It seemed to me that there was one heated pool. Helpful staff in the bars. They joke all the time, it's nice.7 days a week - a day of different national cuisine. If there are special requests - gluten-free, vegan and the like - no problem. Very attentive chefs: Sherif and Ismail are always ready to suggest the composition of dishes, as well as create an individual dish for you from what is presented in the hall. And even prepare a special order for you - pasta, pizza, desserts and gluten-free bread. Super hospitable approach.
data.title: It was a great vacation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Елена Л,
Thank you for sharing your experience with us! We're thrilled to hear that you had a great vacation at our family hotel. It's fantastic to know that you found your stay relaxing and enjoyable, It's wonderful to hear that you appreciated our themed days of different national cuisines and that we were able to accommodate special requests such as gluten-free and vegan options. We'll be sure to pass along your compliments to Chefs Sherif and Ismail for their attentive and hospitable approach in creating individual dishes for you.

We look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay! 
Best regards,
owner_response.author: Guest service  support
